website_summaries.verdict: Fujitsu's ScanSnap S1500 is a fast, compact, and easy-to-use scanner for digitally archiving all your paper documents.
pros: includes OCR software and business-card reader software for Windows users
cons: OCR software isn't available for Mac

customer_reviews.title: Too many software updates!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sick of this. There are constant software updates. I spend more time updating the software than actually using the scanner. There is no reason for a piece of hardware to require so many updates. It's very invasive and it wastes way too much time! Please, knock it off! The software is very old school and hard-to-use. Hardly worthy of all this attention.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Woman

customer_reviews.title: Very useful & it works with Linus OS
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I need for a business scanning thousands of papers every month It has been 7 years since I purchased this scanner and I still use it once a week. Still nothing wrong with it. It comes with drivers for Windows OS but it also works fine with Linux OS with Simple Scan software with Linux packages.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home-office scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this double sided scanner for over 8 years. I use this scanner multiple times daily. The software is easy to use and also comes with a business card management program. This device is one of the best purchases I have ever made. It’s starting to have slips here and there, but still very reliable. I will definitely turn to Fujitsu ScanSnap when I am ready to replace this worthy model.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Morales

customer_reviews.title: Paper to Digital format -- saves file space
customer_reviews.text: Pros 1) Eliminates paper in file cabinets and allows for rapid and clear digital copies of same. 2) Software is user friendly on PC or Mac 3) ABBY Fine reader pdf conversion to searchable pdf 4) CCD (Charge Coupled Device) sensor has more realistic color reproduction as compared to the CIS (Contact Image Sensor) of Fujitsu's ScanSnap iX500 Scaner for PC and Mac. 5) Duplex or Simplex scanning available. 6) Can handle 50 sheets of paper at a time but can continually load as scanning to produce a pdf document 500 sheets long or more. Cons None
customer_reviews.author: Owner Review

customer_reviews.title: New works great, refurbished doesn't!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scanner because of its high reviews and that we have 3 of them in our office that work terrifically. This refurbished product, however, doesn't work well AT ALL!! It actually scans only 20-30% of the time. Sometimes I push the scan button, it blinks and nothing happens. Unplug it, plug it back in, still doesn't scan. Unplug it, plug it back it back in and it finally scans. When it does work, I've never been able to scan more than two pages at a time and sometimes only one of two pages will scan. It just stops scanning. I really wish I would have paid the extra money for a new one!
customer_reviews.author: utesfan3431

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office about 3.5 years ago so I could scan 10 years of paper files into a computer/cloud storage system, and then try to create paperless backups for my open files. This thing is fast, easy to use, compact, and is still going strong after scanning literally tens of thousands of sheets of paper. Anyone who knows me knows I am kind of a penny pincher, because I operate a one person office, and every penny spent on operations is money out of my own pocket. But, purchasing this unit was one of the best purchases I have ever made. I'll by another Fujitsu ScanSnap if this one ever wears out, without question.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Kerner

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner, Time saver, makes going green easy
customer_reviews.text: We've used these and the Xerox 3115/152/162s and these take the cake. They're easy to use, have great software, impressive speed, and great image quality. The movable guides make scanning receipts or large documents easy. The software turns documents easily into PDF files, which is all we needed. The interface makes it easy to save scanned files to directories on a local drive, or a network location. The only quirk I've found is that if you're scanning multiple documents of different sizes together, the largest document must be scanned first. I also bought the carrying case to transport to and from work, allowing me to scan documents from home when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great little scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Fujitsu ScanSnap S1500. I literally wore out the first one. It is a great little desktop rapid scanner. Excellent quality. Product arrived on time. It was appropriately packaged to prevent damage. Thus, there was no damage noted upon its arrival.
customer_reviews.author: jewel53

customer_reviews.title: Awesome... mostly
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably fast scanner. I keep it on the desk and put pretty much any sort of paper into it. I bought it to reduce the amount of paper records in the office and also to see if I could convert some books to eBooks. It's smart enough to differentiate between color and black/white and one sided vs. two sided. Either way, it scans a sheet of paper in about three seconds. The software that comes with it is easy and smooth to use unlike the stuff that's often bundled with hardware. My only disappointment was that the Abbyy FineReader software was a limited function version that doesn't include HTML conversion. Otherwise, this is an amazingly designed piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Larry&Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Wow, really works great
customer_reviews.text: We are on a quest to go as paperless as possible in our house. Most items such as manuals, utility bills, etc. are scanned or just saved to PDF. Our latest project is to scan all of the recipes we've collected over the years. This includes magazine & newspaper clippings, index cards, backs of scrap paper- you name it. This scanner is very easy to use. The included software is excellent. You'll need the (included) sheet carrier to scan small items and mag/paper clippings. All in all, we're very pleased with this product. Has a very small footprint, especially when folded down and not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C

customer_reviews.title: No TWAIN and no compatibility with other software
customer_reviews.text: Like most reviewers of this product, I would love to give it a 4 or even 4.5 rating based on speed, features, quality, and reliability. But I'm knocking off a full point because it does not include a TWAIN driver. That means it can't be used with any other software except that which is provided with the scanner. This is a serious oversight and a debilitating limitation. I would have bought a dozen of these scanners for my business except that it won't work with the TWAIN compatible scanning software we use. So what's left is a nice desktop scanner that can only be used with its own included software--and for that it is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in PSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the seller extremely rude after sending the wrong product TWICE, he told me I had to go buy my own power supply cord for the product when I was finally received the scanner. The scanner is extremely complicated to connect to my laptop and it disconnects at least twice a week. I have to completely uninstall the driver and reinstall everything just to get it to work. It is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Carter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Windows 7; No support available
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great under Windows XP. Unfortunately, under 7, the scanner operates only sporadically, freezing mid-scan. Their website offers little help/support and the link to a possible fix is broken --and no place to report the break.
customer_reviews.author: The Old Crackpot

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Epson WorkForce Pro GT-S50 Document Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Initially ordered the Epson WorkForce Pro GT-250 but had to return that because we kept getting a black line about 1/8-1/4" at the bottom of each page. Epson customer support & seller (Adorama) worked together & gave us a prompt refund. The Fujitsu ScanSnap S1500 works great for our small legal professional services office. Easy set up. Have been using for about one month and only one jam (paper was a little wrinkled) and no scanning quality issues. Previously used scanning software in a Canon all-in-one device and it only scanning 4 pages a minute! Fujitsu is so much faster and has improved the speed and quality of our work product. Highly recommend this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: LHollon

customer_reviews.title: Tax Service Scanner Enhancement
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this scanner. This is the first scanner I have owned that scans documents the way I want them scanned and puts them in the folder where they belong. The nicest part of this scanner is how easy and quickly it scans multiple documents. The choice of where you want to store the documents is so easy with the menu options displayed when the document is done scanning. I recommend this product to anybody who does lots of scanning and is looking for great results. I purchased this scanner for my tax business so I can scan all my documents and save them to client files easy and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: BANGER

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and compact
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! My only gripe is that it sometimes picks up images from the other side of the document and can scan two images when there is only one side of the paper. Luckily it's easily fixed in the scan app but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue9653

customer_reviews.title: Well-engineered scanner
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this to scan receipts and statements, but I think she thought it would not require any effort to organize them. It does. You have to set up categories, folders, keywords, and scan rules to get these into organized folders. Even then, it's of no particular use when it comes time to total them up for, say, tax time. It's mostly about being able to throw away the paper copies. It will do some cool things like scanning to email, scanning photos, etc. The OCR functionality is not very useful, as it tends not to work reliably. But forget OCR -- these devices are for people with OCD. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Love the functionality of this product. Plug it in, install the software and you're ready to go. I liked it so much, I bought one for my Mom to help get rid of her piles of papers/receipts. The PDF files can be converted to searchable text within the PDF file for quick look-up and reference. The only draw-back is the lack of TWAIN support if you intend to scan directly to Quicken or some other document repository. However, the simple work around is to scan to file and then attach/import the file into your favorite software.
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Primer

customer_reviews.title: Now Works Fine
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: i was contacted by Fujitsu through here. Problem resolved by very nice people. Unknown what the error actually was caused by though. Scanner is fast, compact, working software is great, so we'll see if I get that error again... PRIOR: This scanner worked great for a month. Then, I went to use it one day and got the fatal 'Device not Recognized' error. I have tried all of the solutions in their KB without success (with is basically reinstalling the software, killed that device in the USB area, etc.). So, great scanner, but it has software issues with are the type you usually can't diagnose...
customer_reviews.author: R. Dibb

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: I started the search for this scanner on Amazon, reading all the product information and reviews for various products- I did a lot of research. I purchased this scanner to help with the enormously arduous task of scanning property leases for more than 25 properties. I thought this would take me weeks, considering each property lease contains 40 pages of legal paper- some front and back. It took me one day with this scanner! It was fast, clear and very easy to set up. The soft wear is very self-explanatory and the scan options are great- i.e.- you can scan straight to excel or word if you want. I love this thing, for me it was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: was very excited by the features and it worked fine, but was very disappointed recently when it "quit" ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought several years ago, was very excited by the features and it worked fine, but was very disappointed recently when it "quit" on me. I recently got a MS windows tablet with Windows 10 and could not locate a windows 10 software for Fujitsu to download either.
customer_reviews.author: Cid Young

customer_reviews.title: Died after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: This scanner was great when it worked. I didn't use it regularly, but there were times that I needed to scan documents and keep them organized so I purchased this for household use. It died after 14 months. Customer service was not terribly helpful - they said to try another cord and if that doesn't work, it's broken. It was not overused by any stretch. For the price, it should have lasted longer. All of the great reviews might be based on short-term use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: SCANSNAP S1500
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were right on. This is the best little scanner ever invented. I have since purchased 2 more (smaller versions) for our other offices. They all work like dreams. The smallest is so portable it doesn't even need to plug in to the wall, just your PC. I recommend all the ScanSnap machines & the ScanSnap Organizer software that comes with them. Very easy to use. Love the simple 1-button design. I wish this one didn't cost so much (nearly $500), but I would pay it again without blinking if I needed another one. I've had all 3 for over 18 months, & they all still work & work & work.
customer_reviews.author: Taeio Teague

customer_reviews.title: Compact wizard scanner
customer_reviews.text: Price brought this level of speed and flexibility into range where I could justify the purchase. I was very happy with the installation and use of this scanner. Has increased the productivity of scanning in documents and detecting and scanning double sided documents automatically, a feature not available with my multifunction that included the scanning function I had used previously. Someone who does over 200 or so documents a month could justify this scanner. I saw it demonstrated at a national financial planning meeting by the Fujitsu rep. and determined this model was exactly what I needed at this price point. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Fujitsu Scanner S1500
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is GREAT! If you are looking for a great scanner and I do mean great this is your product. My husband and I read many reviews on this scanner and others and we kept coming back to the Fujitsu. Then we saw a video review and was sold. The ease of use, the quality of the scanned receipt sold us. Well worth the $469 price tag. My husband and I started a project to scan all of our important documents and save to a file that we can then save to an external hard drive and keep in out safe so we do not have to keep boxes/file drawers full of papers. Great Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jlrowe40

customer_reviews.title: Blew my mind
customer_reviews.text: This thing scanned so many pages so fast, I was like 'what?' It's fast, quality of scans is pretty good. Does both sides at once. Takes time to get stuff together to scan; takes little time to scan. It's just simple to use and works. If you've got real thin pages with bleed through, you will see that. It's so fast, I was thinking 'how'd it do that so fast?' The quality? Good. How did it do that so fast with that level of quality? File size? Small. It's something that just works. After all the headaches and troubleshooting with other equipment over the years, this one is nice to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Goof Ball

customer_reviews.title: These are the best scanners EVER
customer_reviews.text: They are expensive but worth every penny. I've actually scanned 12 years of files and records. These things take a licking and keep on ticking. Plus, just as equally important, the software is fantastic. It parses and performs OCR on the documents quickly and does an excellent job of getting all the words. The PDF files are also relatively small. I've used a number of different scanners. This one is worth the cost. Note - I actually use the S1500M with my Mac at home. We bought this for the office. Our assistant uses it.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars for early failure
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 25,000 scans and then it started sucking in multiple pages and I spent way too much time trying to clean and then fix it - instructions say that it should have gone to 50,000 scans before needing replacement parts. Because no other competing brands really compete, I just paid another $500 for the new ix500. Then I learned that I could have paid $50 for a replacement part - way too complicated to earn the 4 and 5 stars everybody is giving this item. I'm willing to bet they give the high ratings during the first week or two of buying. I gave it 3 stars for early failure.
customer_reviews.author: RacerRick

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner, Minimal Paper Jams
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is absolutely the best I have ever had. Very quick, 1 pass duplex scanning, good quality scans, and the included software is resource light and makes it easy to just load the tray and hit the button- then voila a PDF on the desktop. Filled my needs exactly. ONE BIG NOTE- if you need TWAIN compatibility, look elsewhere. This scanner is bundled with additional software to help organize scanned items and provide further options for scanning, however, I did not need or want these- so I have not installed them and cannot comment as to their quality.
customer_reviews.author: BILLIAM

customer_reviews.title: Better than Neat Receipt Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I own both the Neat Receipt Scanner and the Fujitsu ScanSnap. I have used the Neat scanner for more than a year. I have used both extensively for home and office scanning of business documents, receipts, contracts, financials, hand written notes and children's artwork. The ScanSnap is faster, better, more accurate and simpler to use. The software bundle and integration with other applications are a big difference between the two; the ScanSnap is superior. Do not make the mistake I did, instead buy the ScanSnap. The ScanSnap does everything the Neat does, but better. Yes, its more expensive - but its worth the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rafie

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow it's quick!
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all I can say, I loaded about 40 documents into this thing and it took about 45 sec to scan! Lightening fast, about 1.5 sec per page. Only problem is it spits em' out so fast it's hard to keep them nice and stacked. I'll have look at getting a box or something for the documents to fall into. So far I'm liking it!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES KERRY

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my empty file cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: I've scanned my whole file cabinet, in my spare time, in a matter of hours. Anything that couldn't be scanned and shredded should have been in a safe deposit box, and now is. I feel better knowing that if the house burns down, I won't lose any information (since I couple this with automatic online backup!). I like knowing that if my house is burglarized, I won't be an easy victim of identity theft (since my hard drive is encrypted). This was one project I should not have put off as long as I did, but I delayed because of the relatively high price for the item. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: N. Black

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The physical set up was a breeze. I'm still learning how to use the management software, but to just scan a document is a breeze without reading any instructions. I'm looking forward to learning more about the document management and search features so I can organize my documents. The purpose of the purchase was not to go completely paperless, but to consolidate the yearly documents and make them easily accessible in case I need to grab and go in an emergency. Now I just need to find a safe way to store my digital data!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely fast in scanning and does both sides of the pages at once. I wish I had purchased this scanner sooner. Scanning monthly bills and payment confirmations quickly and I now have a paperless filing system for my bills. I plan on scanning all of my receipts also so I don't have baskets around containing numerous receipts. Now if only it had software to capture receipt information so I could track spending on specific items. I am well aware of another well advertised scanner that has that feature, so it would be great if the Fujitsu scanner added that capability.
customer_reviews.author: Mosie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic machine. I am an academic and I had accumulated over the course of twenty-odd years a vast collection of notes, offprints, xeroxed copies, etc. It's a huge pain to move all this stuff around. With the Scansnap I have been translating this paper build up into PDF files (searchable!) at a rate of several hundred pages a day. Terrific machine. Amazingly fast, creates high-quality scans; jams occasionally but not very often. OCR works very well -- and works no matter which orientation is used for the paper feeding. I highly recommend this gadget for paper hoarders determined to go digital.
customer_reviews.author: MMD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is a life saver! I use it all the time for my Real Estate business!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Geez I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I LOVE this device. I set it up and started shredding my file cabinets slowly but surely. I could stick a lots of papers in and have it scan everything in without a problem. I don't really use it for receipts as much, but I have DEFINITELY gotten my money out of this great title scanner. Kudos to Fujitsu for a great oroduct! I was worried about it, but really wanted something to help me tackle my financial forms that I had accumulated over the years and this did the job! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: John Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase/investment I've ever made in office equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase/investment I've ever made in office equipment! I do quite a bit of scanning of documents to send to clients. I love its small footprint; it sits on the side of my desk. It scans quickly and pretty quietly, and the quality of the scans is excellent. I've definitely gotten my money's worth since its purchase, and I would definitely buy it again. Big bonus is, it came with Adobe Acrobat software! Highly recommended. In fact, I would use no other scanner now.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Peanut

customer_reviews.title: What A Snap!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit after returning a different brand that would not install properly. Happily, the ScanSnap was a "snap" to install and use. The provided software is very functional and easy to use. The footprint of the S1500 is fairly small and when folded shut takes up very little desk space. Scans are high quality, fast and it does both sides at once. Readily accepts items as small as a gas pump reciept to full page documents. Liked it so much, ordered more for the business. No more storing boxes of old paper files for years on end!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Diehard

customer_reviews.title: Love this scanner, just wish I would've known a newer model was coming out...
customer_reviews.text: I don't regret buying this at all. I just wish I had known a new model was coming out before I purchased it. My mistake for not researching more beforehand. That said, I love this scanner! It's fast, the scans are great, the search capabilities (after setting it to format everything I scan into searchable PDF format) are outstanding, and it's helped me begin to lead a paperless, more clutter-free life. If you can get a good deal on this older model, go for it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: RatherBeTraveling

customer_reviews.title: Game-changer
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tech purchases I have ever made. I no longer keep paper records. Everything's scanned in with OCR in PDFs, so I can search for things quickly and easily. I sleep better at night knowing that my digital copies are backed up, whereas if my house had burned down, I would have lost all of my records since I only had a single paper copy of them. I highly recommend this scanner for anyone with a lot of paper that they want to digitize and make searchable via the OCR functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Didn't care for it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner because it had better reviews than the Neat Document Scanner. I have the Neat portable scanner and software which has worked great - but needed something that had a sheet feed. After receiving the Fujitsu, I had trouble with the scanner itself and the software was nothing close to the Neat software. I know everyone has their own needs when it comes to products like this one. But, this just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: dlilly

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works.. It's fast, it scans a stack papers on both sides. The software works and allows you to organize and store.. It rarely jams up.. I find it simply amazing... What a great product... It seemed a little expensive over other products but I don't care, I would buy it again... It changed the way I do my office work.. I have said that my scanner is used more than my laser printer... Everything gets scanned and organized..
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scanner
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a great scanner, look no further. This has been an excellent scanner and has proved to be very helpful on a day to day basis. You can can scan a paper or a business card. I even scanned my drivers license. I am certainly not using all of the capabilities of this machine, and what I do use has been great. It was easy to set up and easy to use. If it disappeared tomorrow, I would certainly have buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Man

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone that scans regularly
customer_reviews.text: This device just works Support is great if you need it My office is clean of paper The software was easy to set up All old paper files are now saved electronically and I have eliminated 80% of my filing cabinets For the productivity and convenience that this product is cheap, and I will not look at any other one should I have to purchase another one in the future. It is a pleasure to see that there are still companies out there that make quality products :)
customer_reviews.author: Grover Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: A fast and reliable scanner
customer_reviews.text: I am using this scanner to organize paperwork at home. In a week it has reduced much clutter. Scansnap software works very well on Win7. I could not get CardMinder to work, though. I will have to pursue that with Fujitsu. The scanning is really quick. Adobe Acrobat X, while reliable, is probably not the best PDF editing tool available. It has elementary tools to delete and rotate pages, etc. It is better to use the ABBYY software's OCR than Adbobe Acrobat's OCR. Overall, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: I know I did something before I bought this, but the memory of those times is so horrible, I've suppressed it...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is a rockin', rollin' scanner, brought to you by the Kahunas of scanner makers, Fujitsu. Two-sided, color, good compression, direct-to-PDF, high res, good compression, multiple sizes of paper in the same load are OK... the only better thing would be if the scanner read my mind. Did I mention automatic blank page skipping? They DID read at least part of my mind. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B. Norris

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars is not enough
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this baby... i scan everything - no more paper so easy, so reliable, so fast - so perfect one of those things you ask yourself how you ever lived without it
customer_reviews.author: als.josh

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd machine I have purchased. There are excellent additions to your office.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner but limited interfaces
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is NOT capable of using a TWAIN interface. The included software is very good. If you have to use any non-bundled software, though, be sure that it doesn't require a TWAIN driver. There is not TWAIN interface with this scanner. You have to go to other Fujitsu products for that. Prior models from Fujitsu at this price point were TWAIN compliant, but this new model is not. I didn't see that in the specs on the Amazon page (assuming I am missing this somewhere).
customer_reviews.author: James Libecco

customer_reviews.title: fast, powerful
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good scanner. It scans both sides of the document at one time - very fast. Software is great, it will recognize blank pages and re-orient the page to the correct way. Can scan different sizes of document at same time. Business scan to contact software but it will only picks up phone and fax. I cannot get it pick up addresses on the business card. The only drawback is - it will only scan pages (cannot scan a magazine without tearing off the page). I should have known because it does not have a flat place like a copier. Overall, it is a very good scanner.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Love the ix100 as well - perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is an older ScanSnap scanner but it works so well I re-purchased the older model for a secondary scanner in my legal practice. I've not found a more efficient machine since I purchased my original scansnap s1500 in 2011. Love the ix100 as well - perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: BlueLongtail

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best scanner on the market
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best scanner on the market. fast, super high quality, and great text conversion. the ultrasound feature to detect double pages is great. (software could use a boost - ie joining 2 pdfs. (I often scan books and may not fill the trey in time, leaving me to have to make 2 pdfs of a single book) Ultimately, if ur a hardcore scanner with high volume and need solid features, this is the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: Daren S.

customer_reviews.title: How Technology Should Work
customer_reviews.text: This little scanner is incredible. It is small enough to fit almost anywhere. But it works like an ox. As a real estate broker, it has allowed me to go totally paperless. It will take a full contract, scan both sides, and do it faster than machines that are much more expensive. And, knock on my hard head, I have never had a jam in using it well over a year. Imagine: Technology that works without hassle and does exactly what you want it to every time. Now, if Microsoft would have done something about Windows 8 or 8.1 that made any sense...
customer_reviews.author: Laurence A. Huston

customer_reviews.title: Your search is over, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best scanners I have ever used. This is the one you are looking for if you are interested in easy use with excellent results.The software is intuitive and easy to navigate. Your options are almost endless and the footprint of the scanner is relatively small. Perfect for home use especially if you are trying to go paperless. I purchased this after a friend purchased one and used it for a couple of months. He loved it and I am happy to report so do I. Excellent value for a ton of options and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Freq shopper

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Flash Scanner - Be awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this scanner. It is fast ... like ninja Flash type fast. It handles a ton of paper and works seamlessly with Evernote where I keep everything. Its compact and brain dead simple to use. Plug in, install software, load stuff to scan... hit blue button.. smile as it zooms through it all.. double sided as it flies through. Best investment I have made in a scanner and am looking forward to getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lovingood

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-Quick Scanning-Quality Images
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy another product but my sister-in-law told me researched and decided on this one. She has had it about a year and it worked great so I decided to go with this one (always great to have someone do your research for you). I ended up with the project of scanning boxes of old family photos (B&W and color) with it and the image quality is fantastic. I have only had a chance to scan one document (131 double-sided pages) the scanning was quick and image quality was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: CindySue

customer_reviews.title: Wow - you don't find many products like this
customer_reviews.text: There are very few products that i've been excited to receive, but have still managed to exceed my expectations. This scanner is simply fantastic. I've had it installed for about 6 hours and have scanned nearly 5000 sides of paper. Tearing through the filing cabinet has never been more fun. The only real downsides is that the software is a little quirky, but it didn't take me long to get the hang of it. Also I find i need to buy a better shredder - mine overheats and switches off just trying to keep up with the scansnap :)
customer_reviews.author: Graham Stewart

customer_reviews.title: We are now completely paperless
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is fantastic. We bought it 6 months ago based on the high reviews and it has changed our life. We are now completely paperless. It scans all sizes, it rotates, it forgives. We default to shoving almost anything through it and it generally takes the abuse. Combine it with a tool like Dropbox and you have access to all your documents anytime anywhere. Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W

customer_reviews.title: I can't beleive I did not purchase this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Quick to setup and works great. I seldomly have a jam and if I do it is because I forget to remove staples etc. The only issue I have had is that their OCR application does not work as well as let's say Adobe's OCR. Regardless, I have been able to scan thousands of documents quickly and regain control of my papers. By the way, compression technology is fantastic. I was used to MB files for a few documents and am amazed to see the files only a couple of hundred KB's while retaining pretty high resolution.
customer_reviews.author: YadaYada

customer_reviews.title: Small Business
customer_reviews.text: Bought the ScanSnap a couple weeks ago and have already put it through its paces. From small bundles of documents, through large 20+ page contracts, it has performed phenomenally. It's ridiculously easy to use, the scans always come out high quality (and low file size). The machine is nice to look at when folded up and surprisingly small, but it unfolds and has everyone one would need. I was a bit hesitant to buy because of lack of good information/support on Windows 7. I'm using Windows 7 Professional 64-bit not a single problem. Fully supported. Highly recommend and the only thing that waits to be seen is how long this lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Dood1192

customer_reviews.title: Fast bulk scanning of both sides of receipts and other papers
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I have been scanning documents one at a time or a few at a time for years. This thing will munch up to 20 pieces, and scan both sides, then allow you to save it as a pdf where ever you like. And its fast. When it double feeds it pauses giving you the option to save what you have captured and re-feed and continue the process. It is also somewhat portable, I take it on the road with me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR STANDARD SCANNING
customer_reviews.text: I have been please with this scanner's ability to do "standard" scans. It does a great job on scans of documents such as receipts, letters, etc. The scanning software for business cards doesn't work very well. About 2 out of 5 cards that are scanned are stored incorrectly. The software doesn't properly recognize the name of the person and the name of the company. I had hoped for better performance from its card scanning. Also, I have trouble modifying the business cards once they have been scanned. That may be my unfamiliarity with the software but I wish they had made it easier for dummies like me who aren't computer experts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this scanner for 4 years, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this scanner for 4 years, besides cleaning the rolls every year or so nothing else have been necessary to keep it working . It is a low maintenance scanner that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: K family Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is in a word, fabulous! It's much smaller than I expected, nice light footprint, fast, accurate scanning, very good quality, works great with EverNote (the worlds best application IMO). It was worth every penny I spent. I'm extremely satisfied with this purchase. I'm now in the process of going paperless using this scanner in conjunction with EverNote. I'm scanning and shredding my way to organized bliss!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love to scan!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this scanner in so many ways. It was super easy to set up. The flexibility in accepting any document in any direction is great. After scanning, I can straighten the scan and crop it down to whatever I need. The software is easy to use. The quality of the scans is better than expected. I just love that I'm getting rid of the clutter! From this point forward, all my bills, invoices, notes etc. get scanned and then straight to the recycle trash can. No need to file away! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: APMom

customer_reviews.title: Greatest office tool since IBM Selectric
customer_reviews.text: Reliable feed and very fast too. I will never use a slow and quirky all-in-one printer for scanning again. $450 Seems expensive but worth every penny. I converted 5 years of records and receipts in a couple weekends. I'm pdf and paperless from now on. Showed it to my CPA and he bought one, and a month later he bought two more. Don't waste your time or money on other choices like Neat Desk
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lucinda Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner. Fast. The manual sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a great scanner, and worth the money. Really high speed. Phenomenal image quality. Tough to figure out how to use it -- and the manual is so unclear Fujitsu should be embarrassed!! But the scanner itself is great. Love the business card scanner option also. Fujitsu, will you please re-write your ridiculous manual in understandable English so that it is easier to use your wonderful scanner?
customer_reviews.author: Flavor Chemist

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for my office needs
customer_reviews.text: The scanner was delivered as scheduled. Set up was very easy. I hooked the scanner to my USB hub and was having some erratic results so the tech service guys suggested I connect the USB cord directly to the computer. After I did this my problems smoothed out and have enjoyed trouble free operation of this unit. Very small foot print and scanning of documents is fast and accurate. Highly recommend this scanner to others. I tried the Neat machine and had poor results and minimal tech service support. I returned it to Staples and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: ChemEng

customer_reviews.title: Best Feed Scanner out there!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best paper feed scanner out there. The size is small when compared to typical scanners. It is very very fast and and easy to use. The best part of it all is that if you put documents with clips or staples which jam the scanner it is built in such a way that it will be very easy to remove the documents without damaging the scanner. Makes scanning a breeze and the best thing is that you won't have to worry about other damaging it. Finally, when you put away all of its compartments, it will not use much space. Two thumbs up for this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best for small business or home
customer_reviews.text: Must have for a small business. Excellent, reliable, work horse. It is intuitive to operate and never makes a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Donald N. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Scanner is fast, right out of the box. OCR is surprisingly accurate. ScanSnap software could use a bit of UI finesse, but is easy to use. So happy with this product, and feel that it is a great investment. For anyone that has both a Mac and PC, I purchased the PC version, but it appears that the bundled software is ready for both Mac and PC. All the written instructions are also for Mac and PC. It appears the only thing that isn't for both platforms out of the box is Adobe Acrobat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Palmbo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This came recommended by a tech-savvy friend and we ended up buying one for every desk in the office. We use the larger and faster copier/scanner in the work room for bigger jobs, but this unit will quickly and capably scan one side or both, at various quality levels, and in color. For quick scanning - even lots of pages - this is good value. Earlier versions required you to chose between the PC or Mac software, but I think current models some with the software to support either one.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Dorais

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2013, still going strong in 2017.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2013 and have been using it heavily. It is 09/2017 and this scanner is still working like a champ. In the mean time, other scanners I bought during this period have long perished or were just not as good in functionality (paper jams, terrible software etc.).
customer_reviews.author: MPP

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for ways to go "paperless", at least with my most of my frequently used or often mis-filed documents. This scanner, along with Evernote, is an outstanding combination. I also purchased the PDF tools software bundle from tracker-software.com separately. The combination of Evernote, scanner and PDF software has allowed me to put a huge number of frequently used documents online, as well as allowing me to keep up as new documents arrive.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best scanner ever! Works great. The software is easy and does exactly what it is intended to do. Brings Adobe software which is high 5 in my book! I highly recommend this scanner to everyone. It's better the Neat only because in my opinion the software is easier and the back up is easier to pull up.
customer_reviews.author: Pantera

customer_reviews.title: Fujitsu ScanSnap S1500 is just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I cannot lie. I have used the Fujitsu ScanSnap scanners for years and I really love the ease of use of this product. It is easy to set up and can be used with a host of applications. Adobe software is included as well as CardMinder. It scans directly to pdf format, auto simplex or duplex feeds and removes blank pages. This is used in a business atmosphere where dependability is key as we are in a paperless environment. You won't regret your purchase, I don't.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ussery

customer_reviews.title: How did we live without it?
customer_reviews.text: My husband says at least once a day, "I love this thing." It's amazingly fast and easy to use. Open the cover, drop in a stack of papers, hit the blue button, and zip, done. Register receipts get stuck once in a while, but there's a plastic sleeve to scan small items. It can be set up to scan multi-page documents, front and back, and pages can be deleted or edited after scanning. We've been using heavily for about 6 months without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: ARL

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Easiest piece of technology I've ever bought! Put the page in, press the button and it is scanned. Scan to a file, email, etc etc. Super easy and worth every penny!!! Can scan one sided or two, various sizes and multiple pages. Operation is easy but options are varied enough to be a useful for even the most techie techie :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosaleen

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Best !
customer_reviews.text: I used ScanSnap S1500 for about a year in my office before I purchased one for my personal use. I am not tech savy and hate difficult anything. Treat yourself, eliminate paper and make filing an absolute breeze. You really do want this one ! I have used several others that caused a headache everytime. Not this one. It's EASY. Not cheap but EASY. Not cheap but affordable. AND, above everything else............. EASY.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Acklen

customer_reviews.title: Best scanner on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought four of these for my office and I will continue to buy them. They are fast, easy to use and are exactly what you need if you scan a lot and want it done fast. Also the software doesn't slow down your computer like flatbed scanners. It downloads a small window at the bottom of your screen, doesn't slow down you system and that's it. Flat bed scanners are junk, the software is sluggish and and after being burnt on two of those I will never go back. The Fujitsu's are not cheap, selling right at $425 bucks, but you do get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Fast, clear, duplex scanning
customer_reviews.text: Having only dealt previously with all-in-one products, a standalone scanner seemed an extravagant purchase. But after scanning my first 20+ page double-sided document, I'm sold! The scanner was easy to install and the accompanying software supports scanning to a variety of destinations (email, file, printer, specific folders) as well as OCR. I was very impressed by the quality and the small footprint; the scanner fits easily on my already cluttered desk!
customer_reviews.author: jmuns

customer_reviews.title: Quite Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Went from a Brother MFC-type scanner to this, and I can tell you the difference is huge. The ScanSnap is a highly polished software and hardware combination that just works. If you've battled with scanners before, then you know how valuable "just working" is! This is a professional office-grade piece of equipment that exceeded my expectations. It's fast and smart in the way it handles different documents. The double-sided scanning is sweet, especially if you have a duplex printer. Cuts your paper use in half! My only concern is that it seems like it might be a little fragile, but so far, nothing bad has happened.
customer_reviews.author: G. Macdougal

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, well packaged. Love the scanner, quick! I've had very few incidents were it pulled the paper crooked and would jam. Easy one button to release the top panel to easily clear the jam. I really love this product and will buy another when the time comes. Software is simple and easy to use. Not very elaborate, but very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Stevens

customer_reviews.title: This is a MUST
customer_reviews.text: I just started a medical office with charts, and am in the process of going to a paperless, chartless system. WOW this is my key to everything. Scan snap does it all the software everything. I highly recommend this product. I really like the fact that it does both sides at once, also automatically straightens the image, and also it scans health cards front and back, driver license cards etc. Just get it especially if you have your own business, it's well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best scanner ever
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews on Amazon before I purchased this scanner. I installed all the software and then started using the scanner. It is FAST and the files go where I wanted them. the quality of the images is very very good. I am scanning everything now and destroying the paper and saving storage space. Since it scans both sides it is very easy and fast to load the documents and scan them. The only caution is to remove all staples and paper clips. In summary- fast, easy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Georwc

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and functional

customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scanner for home documents. I had boxes of old bills, receipts, etc that I didn't feel comfortable discarding, and wanted a way to keep them digitally. I tried a flat bed scanner to begin with, but it was very slow and cumbersome to use. This document scanner does everything I wanted it to. It scans both sides of multiple pages and does it very quickly. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Slice

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Makes great scans. Scans look as good, or usually better than the originals. Fast, easy to use, small and attractive unit. I am very happy with it. With auto color sensing and blank page removal, I can just load it up and run it. It scans both sides just as fast as one side, deletes the blank back sides of one sided pages, picks up color signatures on black and white documents, and scans different size pages into one pdf. Great way to get the clutter out of my office. Much better than the Kodak i1120 which I gave a try and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck, I promise!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this scanner (older model) while working for another company and I was so impressed with it that I had to have one of my own when I started my business. The price may feel a bit pricey but trust me it will pay for itself immediately! I rarely file any documents, instead I scan them and store them on my computer which really helps me cut down on my office clutter. I PROMISE, YOU WILL NOT REGRET THIS PURCHASE, EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works Great Consistently
customer_reviews.text: I've used this every day for over a year now. I can't imagine how I got along without it. It is fast, easy to use, and dependable. I'm trying to convert most of my paper files to electronic files. I haven't figured out how to work the OCR function, but then again I haven't read the instructions. For scanning files into PDFs it's unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Scanner for Small Business or Home
customer_reviews.text: The ScanSnap S1500 is a great blend of speed, features and price for our small law office consisting of two lawyers and two paralegals. I purchased one to test out as our gateway to the cloud a month ago, and I am extremely happy with its ability to handle a range of documents from paper to plastic cards. The OCR with the included ABBY Finereader software is a huge plus. I am now planning to purchase one for each employee's desk to facilitate our transition to an almost paperless law firm. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Gone are my piles of papers. No more waiting for a block of time to do my scanning. The paper comes in, into the Scan Snap it goes and it's done. I L-O-V-E this product and can't recommend it highly enough. My only piece of advice to future software installers is NOT to install the product to your Program Files folder; I didn't notice that "fine print" and now I have to run the program as an "Administrator" in Windows (which is easy enough, but a chore). Three thumbs up for this product all around.
customer_reviews.author: TroyMI

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: This scanner scans in a "snap" and is very easy to use - just press a button. I have to scan receipts that have been taped to a sheet of paper, and the machine will stop after each one to ask if there was a misfeed; it can be a bit annoying when scanning a lot, but it isn't a deal-breaker. Overall, the scanner has been an excellent addition to the office. I usually scan my docs to a file, which allows me to immediately save it in the right folder with the right name. If I am in a rush, I have set up a "scanned docs" folder, which holds the doc until I can save it later.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best Work Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of those large does it all expensive printer scanner faxes ($6000) range and this scanner is so much more useful. It can grab multiple sized of paper and scan them in without a lot of extra work. I can name the file as I save the scan. It will let me save different formats for different kinds of jobs. We scan and save all our tax reocrds for clients and this has been a game changer. I was able to get more done with less handling of paper and files. So glad I tried this scanner out.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Stapf

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased three of these units, 2 after the initial one. Everyone loves the scanner. It scans fast and accurate and we have had no problems with it. It offers many options and clear detail as well. If not scanning images for photo quality, I recommend this scanner. The cost is high, but it is worth it if you do a lot of scanning.
customer_reviews.author: COA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews on this product and decided to 'go for it.' I could not be happier. The footprint of the ScanSnap is small enough that it sits on my desk. It is fast and accurate. I have had a couple of items to go through at one time, but I just fanned the paper and did not have that problem any more. Also the rack filer program that came with it is great. I would encourage anyone thinking about this item to buy it. I cannot say enough about how pleased I am with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean E. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Account Payable Supervisor
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific scanner. Our company scans a lot of legal documents and this is by far the best scanner we have used. This scanner was recommended to us by a law firm in New Orleans. This is the second one we purchased and we love it. It is very easy to use. Scans pictures beautifully. Scans documents without errors. I would recommend this scanner to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't operate without this!! The best piece of equipment I have purchased for office and home. At times, if the room is humid, the scanner will pull several sheets through at once, but a few tries and it works perfectly, as opposed to the frustrations of trying to scan with my all-in-one larger equipment. Do it!
customer_reviews.author: Buster Kitten

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is the size of a loaf of bread. It's super simple to use and very quick. My 4 yr old can use it. There's a dozen different options to configure how to scan, name, save. I really have no complaints about this machine. It is incredible. Ok, wait... my only complaint is that it's 400$ plus, so when I recommend it to people, they balk at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rubber Biscuit

product_meta.title: Fujitsu ScanSnap S1500 Instant PDF Sheet-Fed Scanner for PC
product_meta.description:
The ScanSnap S1500 provides Windows users an effective way to greatly reduce paper clutter, storage space, and security risk associated with unmanaged paperwork at home or office. Even better, documents scanned by ScanSnap take on a higher level of accessibility and usefulness once liberated into the digital realm.What's in the box: Fujitsu S1500 ScanSnap Sheet-Fed Scanner with ADF, 1-Year Manufacturer's Limited Warranty, Power Cable, Power Adapter, USB Cable, Installation CDs, User Manuals and Carrier Sheet.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The ScanSnap S1500 provides Windows users an effective way to greatly reduce paper clutter, storage space, and security risk associated with unmanaged paperwork at home or office. Even better, documents scanned by ScanSnap take on a higher level of accessibility and usefulness once liberated into the digital realm. Find out how others are freeing up time, space and even money.

Greatly reduce paper clutter and scan up to 20 pages per minute. View larger 
Seamlessly scan and save your files to the cloud The ScanSnap S1500 for PC scans up to 20 pages per minute in color, grayscale, or black & white at an uncompromising 300 dpi resolution. Stack up to 50 pages into the automatic document feeder (ADF) and press the "SCAN" button to scan both sides of each page in a single pass. The S1500 automatically recognizes the size of each document, detects and corrects for skew, and shows images in their proper orientation with blank pages removed.

Load a stack of documents and simply press "Scan" to begin. View larger 
With Intelligent Scan correction documents are organized quickly INTELLIGENT PAPER-FEED DETECTION
ScanSnap S1500 for PC is equipped with a multi-feed detection sensor that can be turned on to help you avoid losing images. What's more, an interactive interface allows users to easily and quickly bypass intentional double-feeds such as a taped-receipt on an expense report or even a sticky note.

FAST SCANNING
Simply load a stack of documents into the automatic document feeder and press the "Scan" button. Capable of holding up to 50 pages in the feeder, ScanSnap S1500 scans both sides simultaneously at a speed of up to 20 pages per minute.

SCANSNAP CARRIER SHEETS
The included carrier sheet allows ScanSnap S1500 the flexibility to digitize large double-letter size documents (A3/B4), photographs, as well as magazine and newspaper clippings. Carrier sheets can be scanned in succession or mixed in with paper documents.

SCANNING TO THE CLOUD
The ScanSnap S1500 provides users direct scanning to Evernote and Google Docs, as well as Salesforce CRM and SharePoint Online (for Windows). It also brings two additional cloud syncing functions: Scan to SugarSync and Scan to Salesforce Chatter. Now you can seamlessly scan and save your scanned files to the cloud for fast and easy accessibility from just about anywhere.

INTELLIGENT FEATURES FOR NEARLY EFFORTLESS SCANNING
The ScanSnap S1500 features a powerful set of automated image processing functions including Auto skew correction, Auto orientation, and Auto color detection. These intelligent features work behind the scenes to help ensure scanned content looks great without effort.

GENERATE EDITABLE MICROSOFT WORD, EXCEL, AND POWERPOINT FILES
Need to make a quick alteration, enhance productivity by scanning paperwork with machine-print back into an editable version with the included ABBYY FineReader for ScanSnap software for PC and Mac.

USEFUL SCANNING SOFTWARE INCLUDED
The ScanSnap S1500 comes with the tools you need to get the most out of your ScanSnap. Included in the package are several useful applications that work with Mac and PC:

>  ScanSnap Organizer V4.1 (PC)--Keep all your scans neatly organized and easily accessible with ScanSnap Organizer. View and edit scans, create filing cabinets, perform searches and more.

CardMinder V4.1 (PC)--With CardMinder 4.1 for Windows adding and managing contact information is a breeze. Simply place the card in the scanner and push the button. CardMinder 4.1 captures the business card and places the information into editable fields. Foriegn language card? No problem. CardMinder 4.1 recognizes 8 different languages and can export to Outlook, Excel and other contact managers.

ABBYY FineReader for ScanSnap (Mac and PC)--This popular OCR (optical character recognition) software lets you scan documents with machine print directly to Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint.

Adobe Acrobat X Standard--With Adobe Acrobat X Standard, users can move beyond merely "seeing" and "printing" PDF documents to searching and editing them however they like. Adobe Acrobat X Standard supports password protection and digital ID creation, ideal for safeguarding personal and confidential information on PDF files.

Scan to Mobile--With the free ScanSnap Connect app, you can link ScanSnap to an iPad or iPhone for viewing on the go.

Compatible Operating Systems

Windows 2000 Professional, Windows XP (32-bit only), Windows Vista (32-bit & 64-bit). Note: Windows 7 Home Premium (32/64-bit), Windows 7 Professional (32/64-bit), Windows 7 Enterprise (32/64-bit), Windows 7 Ultimate (32/64-bit) compatiblity with ScanSnap Manger and ScanSnap Organizer is available via download. Visit: http://www.fujitsu.com/downloads/COMP/fcpa/scanners/windows7_bulletin.pdf.



TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Interface: USB 2.0
 * Scanner Type: ADF (Automatic Document Feeder), duplex color scanning
 * Scanning Modes: Color / Grayscale / Monochrome / Automatic Detection
 * Image Sensor: CCD (Charge coupled device) x 2 
 * Light Source: White cold cathode discharge lamp
 * Optical Resolution: 600 dpi x 2
 * Scanning Speeds: 5-20 sheets per minute (depending on quality selected)
 * Document Sizes: A4, A5, A6, B5, B6, Business Card, Letter, Legal and Custom sizes with carrier sheet
 * Paper Chute Capacity: Maximum 50 sheets (Letter size at 20 lb or 80 g/m2) 
 * Dimensions: 11.5" x 6.3" x 6.2" (292 x 159 x 158mm)
 * Weight: 6.62 lb (3.0 kg)
